visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have two data series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2'. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The chart should also have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes two data series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with specific data points representing monthly average temperatures. The axes and labels are styled with a dark gray color (#555) and a font size of 12px for labels and 14px for the y-axis title. The chart has a light gray background (#f9f9f9) and custom margins to ensure readability. The series are colored green (#008000) and orange (#FFA500) for distinction. The legend is enabled and styled with the same dark gray color and font size for consistency. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
